mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.type AS "type", a.article_type AS "articleType", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.content AS "content", a.hits AS "hits", a.is_auditing AS "isAuditing", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT , b.id AS "user.id", b.login_name AS "user.loginName", b.photo AS "user.photo" FROM it_article a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.create_by = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO it_article( id, title, type, article_type, keywords, content, hits, is_auditing, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{type}, #{articleType}, #{keywords}, #{content}, #{hits}, #{isAuditing}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE it_article a SET a.title = #{title}, a.article_type = #{articleType}, a.keywords = #{keywords}, a.content = #{content}, a.is_auditing = #{isAuditing}, a.update_by = #{updateBy.id}, a.update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE a.id = #{id}
